https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/faQIAAdISZcvQOoEdlkrIUsQpca.jpg Kyoung-sook, who runs a cigarette shop, is secretly learning to dance. Dancing is prohibited and people are arrested. She barely escapes with the help of a man's voice. Dance begins
